The man who achieved the Second Magic, one of the pinnacles of the world of magecraft. He is a leading figure in European mage society, and a founder of the Clock Tower.

He is an observer who awaits the "final answer," while traversing numerous futures and parallel worlds.

Splashes and ripples sparkle, wherever one might be under this soft summer sky.

Let's all celebrate this wonderful day to be remembered...

A giant library that exists, unnoticed, within Novum Chaldea. Regardless of the circumstances of its creation, it is a virtually comprehensive trove of wisdom. All manner of encounters await a curious reader.

Every turn of a page is sure to enrich you with memories surpassing time.

After a hard day's play, be sure to partake in the seaside chef's specialty.

Today's special sandwich is... Hey, paws off, you little critter! You shouldn't grab it before it's even plated!

My prodigious talent led to high hopes and attention from those around me. But I couldn't live up to them, as that just wasn't who I am. I didn't blame anyone or grieve over that situation, but it did lead to me severing ties with my beloved hometown.

That's just the kind of worthless good-for-nothing I am.

But then...I found a partner who got angry on my behalf. I found a kouhai who told me I was good at taking care of others. And best of all, I found someone who understood me at my most beautiful.

Yeah. My life wasn't all doom and gloom. I do have some good memories. Memories I gained thanks to being true to myself.

Here, on the cliffs of reincarnation, I flash a shy smile. A refreshing breeze wafts through the air as the beautiful twilight sun continues to set.

A certain alchemist family's greatest masterpiece, born in a castle shrouded in everlasting winter. The magic circuit engraved throughout her entire body, though meaningless, is the proud girl's reason for being, and a proof of her bond with a great hero.

O beautiful princess, surrounded by children of the forest. What is it you see with those crimson eyes, as red and ardent as the apple you hold in your hand?

The dry leaves hold their breath, the birds stop beating their wings, and the sunlight forgets to bend. None of them dare to move, lest they miss the snow-white girl's slightest movement.

The tiny cat's paws go pitter-patter about as she mewls for a snack.

She jumps about joyfully, as if begging you to play with her.

Finally, the adorable cat rolls over, satisfied...and begins to dream a happy dream.

One person stands atop the stage, showered with thunderous applause. But in the end, they are no more than a pathetic, empty shadow calling themself an actor. Another is confined always to the side of the stage, in the wings. And yet, this empty shadow is truly irreplaceable.

These two people are one and the same.

May this show be a wonderful performance...a world of imagination where the young, the old, and everyone in between can come to have the time of their lives!

She washes her hair under the twinkling stars, combs it with the fragrance of flowers, and dries it with the heat of the nighttime breeze.

The longer she waits for love to find her, the longer her hair grows.

Thus, she sees staying beautiful as the duty of those who would be queen.

The tomboyish princess needs a special billowed dress. The prince with a penchant for tall tales needs a huge ruffled collar to match his larger-than-life stories.

All right, time to hurry. Spin with care. Sew with wishes.

Come on. There's no time to waste. The curtain will be rising on this story (festival) any moment now.

Show us your power, using nothing but your body.

Show us your strength, using nothing but your body.

Wherever you go, kings will await you, hoping for the day they may add a new member to their ranks.

Nothing more remained.

Untold quantities of blood flow across the ground. There's no telling what there may be at its ultimate destination.

But even so, these people continue to move forward, all so they can make an important decision.

Ranmaru has been searching for you for a long time. Even now, their desire to stay by your side blooms like a thousand flowers.

Ranmaru's prayers must have crossed lightyears by this point. Where could they be now?

It doesn't matter how incomprehensible, elusive, or mysterious a case may be. Try as they might to slip into the shadows, no criminal can escape the glint of her eyes. As soon as they see them, they'll be rooted to the spot. But be careful. Once you meet her gaze, criminal or not, you'll find yourself so enthralled with her beauty that your legs will turn to stone...along with the rest of you.

Gorgeous. Simply gorgeous.
How fortunate I am to witness this.

The loveliest shrine maiden of all time, burdened with being a perch for the gods themselves, weaves a mesmerizing spell with her dance.

She was a drifter. Nothing more, nothing less.

Forced to live a life of severe isolation, the constant gazes of envy tinged with fear that beset her from all sides never let her rest for even a moment. While she did manage to find temporary respites during her tragic journey, she never arrived at a final destination.

And so, she became thoroughly exhausted.

Having lost everything she ever cared about, all she retained were her heartrending prayers for the one she loved.

Ah, Yu, my Yu... What will your fate be?

Those parting words were the only reason she continued to exist; her only source of comfort amidst endless darkness.

The crimson flower looks up at the sky. Even in the onset of night, it remains strikingly beautiful.

What a beautiful night. The snow and the lights make the night sky twinkle even brighter than usual.

You showed me so many fun things, but what made me happiest...was holding your warm hand.

"You know what I heard? They say that when dragons get cold or lonely, they sometimes end up dying."

If you're having trouble sleeping, it would be my honor as Fergus, brave warrior of Ulster, to keep you company.

What's that? No thank you? You feel like the earth might swallow you up at any moment now?

...Haha. Guess I struck out tonight. But at least I'm pretty sure I got a little smile out of her. It's only a start, but I'll take it.

"I hope these presents put smiles on the children's faces."

Tonight is Christmas, the one night of the year Santa Claus makes children's wishes come true, and children, in turn, make Santa's wish come true.

A true lady must remain modest at all times...even when the very Knight of the Round Table she admires more than anyone appears right in front of her!

The best thing I can do right now is make sure tonight's party comes together perfectly!

She was once called the Holy Maiden of Winter. After being kept in an ancient castle on a snowy mountain for an eternity since she was minted, her mind, her transient soul, and even her memory circuits have all been worn down to near oblivion. Now, having become the foundation for a great feat, she lives the same unchanging day over and over.

For those on the outside, she seems to be a beautiful device. For those obsessed, she seems to be the picture of regret inscribed on days of old. And for the other girls, she seems like the ultimate glory to strive for.

But that is all long in the past now. Here, within this perfect world, the saint dozes in peace, so that she may better embrace the many ideals she was never able to fulfill.

In a world of permanent winter, the two innocent children devote themselves to the role they were given; even if that role is no more than a tiny cog in a larger machine meant to realize a grand ambition.

Whether teaching or friendship, they give all they have to protect a single, solitary white flower; the only one of its kind in the world.
Keep your backs straight, the school buildings well-ventilated, the mood light, and your conversations pleasant. Such things may be obvious, but they're also more precious than anything.

There's nothing like getting away from the din of daily life by going to the great outdoors. When there's nothing there but nature, that's when you're free to make your own fun.
Won't you take my hand and join us?

If one considers even freezing cold days as moments of contemplation with which to better rack one's brains, strengthen one's strategy, and plan one's next move, then they become times to be welcomed rather than endured.

Now come, and let us wait for the plums' seams to show, and the new sprouts to blossom with life. Indeed, quiet times like these are precisely what bring tacticians the most joy.

My howls echo across the distant sky. Where are you, waking one? Are you still out there somewhere, stubbornly holding on?

I still can't hear you breathing in your sleep. The morning remains driven away, far off beyond the ruins.

Happy New Year! Feast your eyes upon the first Avenger drawing of the new year.

Do I have any resolutions? Hell no. But I do have this one-of-a-kind kite I drew on.

...Here, take it. And you'd better appreciate it, dammit!

To all the Chaldea staff, and all the Servants who are always working so hard,

I made this traditional Japanese New Year's food called "osechi ryouri" for you to show my appreciation.
I think it turned out okay, thanks to my cooking advisor's help!

When Ashikaga Yoshimitsu ordered Ikkyu Soujun to capture a tiger painted on a folding screen, Ikkyu smiled almost imperceptibly and agreed, but only after Yoshimitsu let the tiger out from the screen.
A furious Yoshimitsu did just that, followed by fusing with the tiger himself and turning into a terrifying, rampaging machine of death.

There is no longer anywhere on earth that Ikkyu or his companions can escape from Yoshimitsu's road rage.

Even in Faerie Britain, Valentine's Day was considered a special occasion. That made it the perfect occasion for the lord of a domain to break out their magecraft to demonstrate their majesty.

"Very well. I, the queen, shall make the greatest chocolate ever seen, no matter how much it costs or how long it takes. Now, tell me: What sort of chocolate do you desire?"
"Oh Mother, I looove how much of the faeries' existence tax you're willing to throw in♡
Well, pissant? You gonna accept our gift or what?"

As someone searching for true love, it just makes sense that she would become absorbed in making chocolate treats for Valentine's Day. And so, she attempts every possible combination she can think of, including several involving herself, while simulating the time she will be reunited with her beloved king. Whatever you do, don't even think about suggesting she may have gone too far.

There are many different varieties of chocolate, but for goddesses from South America, nothing beats xocolatl. Whenever you get back from a trip in the freezing cold, we want to warm you up with a cup of hot xocolatl and a big smile!

Chaldea, Inc. was in one of its busiest periods ever. But when enemies started popping up left and right, and both HP and QP were hitting rock bottom...

To this day, I've never tasted anything as sweet as those hand-wrapped chocolates.

"I'm not frivolous enough to join in on the festivities, but I'm happy to take requests. I am a prince, you know. Just don't expect any sweet developments, okay?"

"Accept my gift of the fragrance of paradise as you continue on your journey. Ah yes, it's a beautiful rose, but don't fret. My flowers have no thorns."

This is for you, who frolics in the spring garden...
...who has been draped in the curtain of night.
These costars will appear together for one night only.

"What's going on, Archer? You must be losing your touch as a sniper if you're getting hit by a spearman's gun!"

"Heh. Must be because he spends all his time in the kitchen, cooking three-course meals, including dessert!"

"I have to admit your surprise attack from the shallows took me unawares! Plus you're using the latest water gun! I suppose even that spear you're so proud of is obsolete now!"

"Ha, I only did it to be on the same level as you! I borrowed it from the Saber in the green cape!"

"What!? Impossible, I've been asking to borrow it every five minutes! Why have you got the King of Knights' gun?! And I thought I rented this whole place out―who gave you permission to enter!?"

"(The younger) You did!!!"

Waku Waku Zabuun is a recreational facility where citizens can come to relax. In one corner, a water gun battle between an odd group of Heroic Spirit breaks out!

"Farewell, great detective..."

A great crime syndicate whose tendrils extend all across Europe. The detective travels far and wide in search of its leader, accompanied by a man claiming to be a completely ordinary merchant who only wants the bounty on the leader's head.

When the supposed mastermind is finally found, he turns out to be a man they both know well. As the detective stands on the cliff where the man disappeared, he mutters to himself, "This isn't over... I'll chase you 'round perdition's flames before I give you up. It's my job as detective to close this case once and for all!"

"I've come this far. I'll stick with you until the very end, too!"

...This will be his last case.

"Looks like the perp escaped into this alley... We'd better play it safe, Senpai."

"Hey, relax, kid. Don't get all stiff and serious. It's best to take this kinda thing nice and easy."

Two cops, partnered up at the last minute, working to solve a case. They may come from different backgrounds, but they're both dedicated to seeing justice done.

"Ah, the young prince, what is your business with me tonight? Surely you haven't come here to befriend me."

"Must you always be obfuscating? Did you think I wouldn't see through your pretense of barbarity?"

Rumors abound of bandits in the capital. However, the bandits targeted only corrupt politicians, merchants who wield their influence like a club, and the thugs who serve as their lackeys... At last, the young man seeking the truth has arrived at the dwelling of the man thought to be the bandits' leader. The still sharp eyes of the old soldier standing guard in the back of the room never leave the young prince.

"If you are not truly resolved, it would be better to leave."

The young man takes a good look at the goblet in his hand, then drains its contents in a single gulp.

The conductor flashes a shy smile at the passenger lost in his train ride.

"I hope your ride has been comfortable for you, sir. Please don't hesitate to ask for anything."

"Thank you. This cabin is simply wonderful. I look forward to your hospitality throughout the trip."

The porter watches the scene with a smile, as he knows that the conductor has been working diligently to prepare for this day.

"We are off to a good start. May luck follow you on the journey you're about to take...!"

"You humans are so arrogant that you never once stopped to wonder whether tomorrow would actually come. Now, the path that once looped endlessly has at long last fixed upon a final destination."

Thanks to a distortion that appeared at the edge of the galaxy, the unbroken line of human history is about to come to an end.

"I—we, are going to seize our future with our own hands!"

"Seabirds naturally make their way to land, even if the sight of it may be obstructed by thunderclouds in their path. They know land is where they'll find hope."

Will their many bonds be enough to save the world!?

"Yo, Mandricardo. Didja hear?
Steamed meat buns are fifty yen off right now."
"I just got paid, so ya know what that means...I'm payin'. I'll even throw in a drink! You're comin' with us, yeah?"
"Uh...y-yeah. I'll hang out with you guys. Thank you for treating me!"

Despite appearances, they actually get along pretty well...probably.

"Mmmmmm! ...Hooked it a bit to the right. Not quite the exquisite swing I was going for."

"Hey, nice shot! Considering your curious appearance, you sure put a lot of power behind that swing, Douman!
All right, my turn now. This might be ambitious, but I'm going to try to reach the green in one stroke!"

(It would be a fool's errand to try to compete with these two in terms of sheer power, especially in the long haul. Not to mention it would be murder on my poor back!)

Great figures from history enjoy a most modern sport on a clear, sunny day.

This may seem casual, but don't be fooled. None of them can help but give it their all when there's a competition to be won...

Lightning strikes the majestic skyscraper...because it must, both to live up to expectations, and to deliver value for the budget spent on it.

"Thunder, lightning! Full power! Fuhahahahahahahahaha! Come, Master! Victory is nearly within our grasp!"

One of the most prominent genius Casters of the century, best known for her discovery of Kykeon Particles. Now that she's detected particles in New York as well, she has devoted herself completely to her fieldwork.

Be careful if you cross her path, as she has a habit of turning people into adorable piglets.

A company that originally lent out assassins for hire, but pivoted into information gathering and marketing. Without their whimsical CEO, high-powered department head, and capable secretary, they simply wouldn't be what they are today. Even their famous singer, P, has come back after nearly drowning in the digital sea. Despite handing in her resignation, Oshizu (now known as Poisonkiss) still helps them out as an occasional consultant.

The King of Heroes takes his festivals seriously. They may be from different universes, but the KoH from Earth and the KoH from the Servantverse are both unswervingly dedicated to their work.

They've also brought on some help from Earth—an honorary chairwoman and a goddess of prosperity—to help with the proceedings.

An institution of higher learning attended by many young students who dream of becoming tomorrow's SSR Servants. Led by its first principal, God Bless Edison, this school boasts a devoted staff of teachers to help bring up the next generation of Servants. The dependable girls' dormitory leader is still going strong as well.
Traces of empty shadows fall without end, neither stopping nor dispersing.
A cursed heap of bones and rubble. An ominous aura rises up to permeate the nearby sky.

A gentle breeze blows across the water a scant few minutes before dusk falls. Garbed in an exotic outfit, the goddess stands alone and beautiful. Has the evening sun made her cheeks appear red? Or is she, perhaps, hiding a blush?

The xiake hiding in the twilight shadows whispers to you.

"You know, Master, they say there're monsters out there that can kill you if you so much as look at them. So try to stay sharp, or they'll eat you alive!"

One of an empress's duties is to observe life on the streets, and that is even more the case in foreign lands. So surely, there must be some greater meaning to the pile of packages the Torturer accompanying her is carrying.

...Then again, maybe not.

"What? There's nothing strange about this. I'm just giving my fans what they want...like a handshake event that just happens to look like a hug. Not that I'd ever do handshake events, of course. That aside...you kind of smell like the sun, huh."

Whether her number one fan on this island knows it or not, more than anything, Leviathan was grateful that her day off was a peaceful one.

I happened across a bar and stopped in. There, I encountered one of the most mysterious men I've met in my life. With a light, mocking tone, he told me he had just finished a job.

"You're an art dealer, right? I can tell from the way you look at things. You're searching for the most beautiful thing here purely on reflex."

In a strange coincidence, he knew a great deal about paintings. We ended up talking about one painting in particular on display in the city's museum: a Tiziano, or Titian as he's known elsewhere, called "Sacred and Profane Love."

"To tell the truth, I don't know the first thing about art. I can't tell a Dali from dog shit. I can, however, spot the grandiose, the precious, and the well-made, but no more than that. I sense nothing of what society calls 'love.'"

They say beauty is that which provides people with love, or is something they love in turn. Apparently, this man had no way of experiencing that joy or satisfaction for himself.

"Beauty should be found in what is past. Only when something is lost or broken do you realize its importance. It is not a matter of admiration, but of mourning. There is nothing more beautiful than what you cannot ever reclaim."

I couldn't agree with him. After all...

"Yeah. That's right, brother. The moment you damage something so that you can feel love for it, you lose what you've come to love. There's no goddamn point. No salvation, no retribution... Nothing. So then, why love at all?"

Having said his piece, as though it had all been a big joke, the man got up from his seat and left.

...In the distance, I heard the wailing of an ambulance. It made me think of death.

A beautiful silver maiden sits atop a throne.

She is alone in her icy castle. Her captivating smile is for no one in particular as she sings an enchanting song to herself, cloaked in an air of golden majesty.

A perfidious dream goes round and around in a pure, untainted paradise. Here, an awkward mage who refused to wake up after her normal life was shattered stands alone.

Now that she is the last to witness this land, she keeps her back firmly turned to the exit.

An affectionate melody echoes throughout the house of God.

Here, in this place far removed from Heaven, this music, played without skill, talent, or even passion, is evocative of both deserted wastelands and pious prayer.

Turning, turning. The world (of film) keeps turning. What kind of movies do you like? Dramatic thrillers? Psychological rom-coms? It's all good. Go ahead. Ad-lib all your lines. You yourself are nonfiction, after all.

Just promise me one thing. Whatever movie we make, let's make sure it's spectacular, emotional, and above all, merry!

The children follow the big river wherever it goes, their little bodies brimming with hopes and dreams. It doesn't matter how fast the river carries them, how cold the wind blows, or how much the water shakes them. As long as they're with their beloved friends, even the world's flimsiest raft can be a beautiful one-of-a-kind yacht.

A remote, unexplored area in the heart of a dense forest.

What's that? You think there's nothing here? You couldn't be more wrong. There's the joy of making new friends all around. No path to follow? That's right. We're free to go wherever we like here.

This is a world still untouched by humans, a sea of land covered in dreams.

Memories of the prehistoric world, buried in the ground for ages. Mementos forgotten by time, reduced to mere objects.

Some people call such clumps "desire." Others use much more beautiful language to describe such things.

What will you call it when you finally get your hands on it?

The formidable fangs of the strongest species ever to live.
Its terrifying roar gives birth to beings of unparalleled strength.
A bridge of glory available only to heroes who have proven their worth. Even if the prestige they win is one day forgotten, the results of their battle will remain in history forever more.
The radiant light of a stone that has yet to be fully born. Though it is no more than ore, it still gives off a warm color pulsing with life.
A spiral of seashells that brings back memories of ancient times. The echoing sounds of the sea within are as vivid and vibrant as ever.
A flowery cluster of eternal flame dancing across the mountain peaks. Its graceful wings expand to illuminate every centimeter of the eastern sky.

She is the one who wields them all. All manner of light bows before her, devoted to serving her every whim.

Karma comes to fruition, brimming with light from the moon.

With the five elements at her command, this rare and precious gem reaches its potential, revealing the deepest secrets sorcery has to offer.

Facing the embodiment of a nightmare bent on taking his life, the boy builds up power to bind it.

Even though he is so terrified he has forgotten his pledge to protect, he continues on, relentless. He will never stop, not as long as there remains something on which he refuses to compromise.

Forward. Ever forward. Feel the red wind at your back, even as you strive to push past it.

The proud man pens his will. His mind is completely made up. The shadow that lurks within is born from a heart with no room to breathe. Such a thing would never be possible for one lacking in elegance.

So this is simply determination. A bid to rid himself of any lingering regrets. All in the service of becoming a truly perfect father.

For him, lives were no more than a resource to be spent. He treated them this way because he could see no other worth in them. Even if that meant he would receive nothing of equivalent value in exchange for his own life.

The girl from Alimango smiles like a pristine flower of pure white. Bathed in dazzling sunlight, with the gentle sound of the tide washing all around her, her mind wanders incessantly to distant memories.

What must one do to be a good person? The answer is obvious: help those in need. Knight or not, that is what any decent human must strive to do.

I want you to feel the earth under your feet. I want you to take a deep breath, yell at the top of your lungs, and laugh until your sides hurt.

Yes...when you get right down to it, that is all I truly desire.

...This is awful. I don't have the right to end my life in such bliss.

...This is a scene from a dream. A vision of impossible worlds where fast-beating hearts are drawn together, cherishing the joy of loving and being loved.

Yet despite knowing they can never be, you can still see them clearly. Frivolous days spent leaping across fantasies, frolicking in fields, and earnestly embracing the gentle breeze that accompanies those who are irreplaceably precious to us.

It was a long...long winter. Perhaps things would have been easier if he had just frozen to death. But without making mistakes, leaving regrets, or suffering defeat, he would not now know what it is he must do.

He's not doing this for anyone else. Even if he's ultimately powerless to help, or has no chance of winning, he won't let that stop him from trying. For thanks to those scarred hands, he now knows that this is a battle fought by all who were never gifted with natural talent.

Now, the dawn has broken. And so, the wolf sets out on the journey ahead, as different from who he once was as a butterfly emerging from a chrysalis.

I can see Mt. Fuji off in the distance. My heart flutters like a willow dancing in the wind, my fingers impulsively tracing its contours.

Merely sketching it would be a waste, but I simply don't have time to render it in the detail it deserves.

Ahh, what a beautiful journey. Should I be angry that I can never capture such beauty, or simply glad for the chance to witness it?

I fear this dilemma may drive me crazy.

Here at a zenith beyond the reach of ordinary people, sharp blades dance gracefully and majestic lances strike at lightning speed. There is no defense, only offense; all advantage, no downside. Little wonder then that neither side is giving so much as a centimeter in this unparalleled spectacle. Even the moon, tired of looking down, cannot help but yawn—a yawn that quickly vanishes amidst the endless echoes of blades clashing.

Freedom. Yes, here, there is freedom to be found. Grass as far as the eye can see, with no end in sight.

Come, my friends. Let us run. Let us bound. Let us feel the wind at our backs as we pursue the smell of grass.

I am putting all my heart into this bullet. No matter where you run, no matter where you hide, I shall fire it straight through your chest. Prepare to meet your maker.

"Uh, Tomoe? Are you seriously aiming for the heart?"
"Why yes, I am. Why do you ask?"
Forbidden stories from a carefully chosen compendium. Their pages slip into all kinds of books of their own accord to promulgate falsehoods.
Seemingly countless cogwheels that appear to bloom like bejeweled flowers. This mechanical dance continues ever onward, spinning to bring dreams without end.
A burial urn with vivid red tears dripping down from a single enormous eye. The wailing stagnation simmers and stews as it curses the living with every ounce of its being.
A spiritual elixir atrium designed to lay the foundation for all manner of Mystics. False plasma flows through patchwork rivers to reach the foundation.

Two beasts who both came to the North Pole.

"Now that we've got new outfits too, it's time to start surveying the enemy."

"Never mind that, Yaskaya! I found a cute new beverage! A pink one!"

"Oh my, you got this for me? Quite the discerning eye you have, Lady Nikitich. Mmm, it's not nearly as sweet as it looks. I love it."

The summer survey begins...and they're still just getting started...

There's something about traveling by sea that gets your heart racing. Between the beautiful scenery drifting by, the wind in your hair, and the delightfully sweet aroma of fruit tickling your nose, there's something for all five of your senses to enjoy. There's no rush. We have all the time in the world to get where we're going.

After seeing how much fun their senpai were having, the oni and the serpent decided to become apprentice jiāngshī themselves. They've been trying all sorts of tricks to scare people...but it looks like they still have a long way to go before their haunted house debut.

It's only when there are no others around that gods elect to reveal themselves. Even though ominous substances drip from his fingers, and even though he may look hopelessly downcast...there is still something as graceful and beautiful about him as crystal clear water.

Fishing is great. You can do it anytime, anywhere, and always have a blast. You can try whatever fishing technique you can think of, and you could easily end up with something that isn't fish at all. And when this time is shared with a fellow fishing enthusiast, well...there's just nothing better than that.

A great Celtic warrior and a nameless swordfighter greet you at the entrance to the magical theme park that recently appeared at the northmost edge of the world. You don't know what awaits you in this land of eternal summer, but you can't wait to find out.

I was excited to come here and start investigating this land, but all I see are what appear to be endless icy mountains and the hot sun bearing down on us all. It doesn't look like there's anything here, and it seems like it'll be difficult to get around on top of all that.

But that's okay! No matter what happens, Master, this fist of mine will keep you safe!

Warriors advance. They smash through the ice floes that obstruct them and beat down the blizzard blowing before their eyes. No matter the time or place, a true warrior always strives to be strong, proud, and beautiful.

The simulation's results are read aloud matter-of-factly. It really is amazing that we've made it this far.

Masters and mages are not equals. Even if someone has an aptitude for one or the other, the skills one needs to develop are a different matter entirely.
But of course, that's what makes teaching so worthwhile. We still have a long way to go before we catch up to Team A, though...

A good strategy starts with a good meeting.

These days, most meetings at Chaldea take place with delicious sandwiches or rich cups of coffee close at hand, and everyone frankly sharing their thoughts with one another.
Sometimes this process leads to great ideas, and sometimes, it just leads to time well spent.

After several journeys, and lots of amazing encounters, both our hearts and our storage containers are filled to the brim with precious mementos.

Sometimes, things come spilling out because there just isn't room for them all, but together, with everyone's help, we're slowly finding places for everything.
And once we're done, we'll be ready for the next adventure.

I've seen the evil that lurks in people across countless battlefields.
I've seen hells where innocent flowers are mowed down left and right.
And through it all, in every desolate wasteland of death and destruction...I've seen life's inner strength continue pushing it to survive.

That is why I sought the savior's fragments. That is why I overcame conflict with so many intelligences.

For this is the only path I can take to avenge the many lives lost and restore this decrepit world to one with a chance to flourish once again.

The aged soldier waits patiently. He knows there will come a time when he and his dignity are needed once more.

He turns his gaze to his black iron spear—a spear he once thought had nothing left to do but gather rust—and approaches it quietly, with honor and pride in his heart.

He prays that the winding, twisted path he has followed thus far will one day lead to where he believes he was always meant to go.

Fury like the surging sea swirls and rises.

She had never forgotten. She cannot forget. She's never been able to shake off the smoldering thoughts that have burdened her for so long.

Will she escape her fate, inevitable though it is? Or will it engulf her and drag her down into darkness?

The tip of the blade that was entrusted to her now hangs in the air with nobody to protect...so who will she wield it for now?

There was no acknowledgement. No agreement. But sometimes you just have to do it. That's life for you.

At times like this, taking a break and having some tea is the way to go.

But then again, whether he was placed in this predicament unreasonably, or he had it coming...well that would be very different, like night and day, now wouldn't it?

Knead, turn... Turn and knead again.

Molding the earth's soil with your own hands to give it new form.

If you see your art as you might your own children, then this might be a way of creating new life.

To those who cross the hill overlooking the mountain pass and take a long, long journey...

A lovely shrine maiden prays with all her heart, while a cheerful shrine maiden wishes for your safety, and both hope your destination will be a happy one.

They also send you off with some delicious tea.
A wreath of foolish chains that impede a brave soul from setting off on their journey. They can bind your body as much as they want, but they can never restrain your mind.
A mass of wailing stakes lined up in the dark of night. Each one stitches a dead soul to the conduit so as not to taint their eternal parting.

The moment right before night comes to an end, when you can still see the stars in the sky. That was the time of day he liked best.

One time, when I had nothing better to do, I asked him which star was his favorite, even though I didn't give a rat's ass either way.

"Sirius."

He said its light is the strongest you can see when observing the night sky. He went on about how it was like a lighthouse showing us the way from Earth to the furthest reaches of the galaxy, while smiling a know-it-all grin.

...No fair. It was so damn ironic I couldn't even bring myself to take the piss like usual.

"Hey. What're you gonna do once you're the last human?"

It was a good question, he said. He followed it up coolly, but with just a hint of sadness:

"Would you believe me if I said I'm thinking of going on a trip wherever the wind takes me, with no destination in mind?"

I still think about what that future would've been like.

"I'd start by crossing that ocean and seeing how everything has changed."

In that moment, he was as bright and dazzling as the morning sun.

It was supposed to be no more than a source of power, yet it also served as a harbinger of good tidings.

The man asked her to lend him the bloody scale she had chosen numerous times before, to grant his dear wish...that she would become his bride.

Her face stained with the darkness that had fallen from the sky, she replied in a loving, nostalgic tone...

To master your mentor's instructions is to inherit their will and carve a path into the future.

Even if the time spent under their tutelage is as fleeting as a flickering flame, the torch they pass on will burn ever within.

As one lies leisurely in a languid space, incoherent small talk and aimless interjections feels like a feather sinking below water.
Dozing off.
Swaying.
None of these actions have any particular purpose behind them.

Ah, but a beautiful flower experiencing opulence at its finest.

When the blue sky feels especially tall, it calls for a leisurely stroll.
Let's dress up in frilly, cute outfits and have a good laugh as our eyes sparkle and we laugh playful with glee.

We'll prepare some fancier tea leaves than usual.
And our snacks should be extra sweet, right?

Sweat trickling down one's face is the best type of boon to bring about a smile. It's especially pleasing when the fruits of your labor end up satisfying someone else's stomach. 
The sense of accomplishment you feel as your harvest weighs heavily in your hands, the stinging pain your skin feels from the sunlight, and the smell of the soil that clings to you...all is a kind of gratuitous joy that differs from the battlefield.

You, blooming ever so magnificently.
Like a staff that twirls without reserve and like a lotus that changes color a thousand ways, its beauty knows no bounds.
Hence, there is no way we can resist admiring her.

It is necessary to possess reasonable capacity and power whether leading or following. Being a leader cannot be accomplished if one simply mimics strength. True glory only comes through tireless devotion practiced on a daily basis.

However, be mindful to keep your eyes open, for you do not want to be manipulated by a silver tongue and become a laughing stock.

Laughter is paired well with flowing tears to be admired...one's heart is filled with joy once any insecurities are washed down with a drink.

The thirst for a cup of drink is a thirst of the heart. Once the cup is filled, the heart is also filled.
That's what a banquet is. That is unmistakably what a banquet is for.
That holds true for tomorrow. The day after tomorrow. And the days after that.

Come now, how about a cup of alcohol?
Nuts from a great tree. Within each lurks myriad possible worlds. The branches which bear fruit may all be the same, but each bud is bursting with potential.
A tomb of those who succumbed to the vicious scorpion which dwells in the hot sand. Even in death there is no rest, as its poisonous sting corrupts the soul.
Billowy fury is cast upon the fools who violate its repose. Its surging resentment can never be pacified, no matter how many try.
Banners and badges of military exploits hang proudly against the chalk-white wall. Prestige that only a great knight can possess is both dazzling and paramount.
It is time. The challengers shall prove their strength and reach the top before anyone else. Now come, head to the apex where the queen awaits.
Keep climbing to the highest of heights. Grasp your destiny with your own hands. It's only natural to stand above others, whether as a fighter or an adjudicator.

The lava's heat scorches the body. The noxious fumes of the swamp leave the head tingling and numb. The obstacles ahead offer no respite, and the summit seems an eternity away. Yet the challengers pour every ounce of strength into their limbs as they run toward the summit. Each believes their well-trained muscles and relentless fighting spirit will help them carry on.

One, two, three!
One, two...what? Did I miscount?
Huh? It hurts?
Come on, Master. Don't be such a wimp.

Oh, sorry!
I might've been doing the Sir Gawain-style stretches!

An event first requires people who operate the festivities. A medical team must be present to treat the injured. Coordinators must manage the athletic events. Commentators and reporters must be the ones to spread the excitement around and about the events themselves. Of course, don't forget the assistants who keep everything running behind the scenes.

However...
Management has no comment on the perception that some of the staff members look quite shady...

The precipice of black night. Tiny insects spread among the trees rise and take flight. Their destination isn't a pool of dirty cleaning water. It's simply the gentle, warm spring breeze, whistling into the forest.

The act of refusing to fill the glass is a rejection of the glass's very existence. It is no less than defiance of our God and creator Himself. He is thirsty, so He should quench that thirst.

If He still exists.
A beautiful sapphire from the world of magecraft and the world's most beautiful huntress. What flies from her graceful fingertips is a powerful, noble, utterly straight, and pure note.

Teachings are merely someone's recorded experiences. No matter how righteous one's path, they illuminate different aspects of truth from different perspectives. Contradictions are a natural consequence of this.

In other words...

It is not my own teachings that I should be reciting. No, I should spread the word of my god, who illuminates all of creation!

God is glorious!

The revelation of the iron horseshoe that falls and burns, hailing from the distant sky.
The footprints marked on the ground direct others to unexplored passages.
Like a beast grasping onto something precious, this ostentatious treasure house enshrines mundane wealth. While it pushes aside nobility, it still pulsates with wild power and curses.

Every stitch woven with great care.

May each thread protect Master.
May the fabric itself protect Mash.
May these pockets overflow with wondrous memories.
May the recollections of this vibrant journey be sewn on the hearts of all who partook, as proof it occurred...

The two continue dreaming of new clothes to make―and of the journey ahead.
A hail of gunfire echoes through the immaculate, silvery forest. Humanity's ingenuity repels the snarling beast.
The menacing snake eyes lurk amidst the opulent wealth. They glare at the greedy to stop them in their tracks, inviting them to their burial in the everlasting night within.

Gingerly, she cradles a blindingly fresh, first moment in her small palms.

This journey can't be completed in a single bound—all the more reason for her to savor the joy of each step you take together.

Come one, come all!  Welcome to our grand first sale of the year, packed with dreams, hope, and greed. Whether you're surprised, excited, or even occasionally disappointed, all of these seeds can bloom into laughter. One thing's for sure, though...

Everything you obtain will become a special memory, just for you.

It's a curse...

Humanity ignored Mother Nature's rules and greedily multiplied the bunnies. Now it's time to pay the piper. There're too many. No one can stop them. They're coming. Look how far they've gotten already.

Uoooogh! Hurry up and come to my house, too!

My only friends were Tepeu and you, the sun, who always watched over me. But our lives were more filled with twists and turns and love than any other form of humanity.

After sixty-six million years, we finally became humankind, just like you, aiming for the same sky...to the beyond.

This is a painting of bygone days, a tiny, special something that came into being in that sea of trees where everyone was treated with equal value and respect: two people watching the ancient stars fall. And you're the painter, drawing our adventure in which we traveled wherever we pleased while repeating our mistakes, forgetting that everyone is the same and is treated the same.

Dark, otherworldly lamplight is caged and suspended from the ceiling.
Each cradle is shaped to accommodate the soul within.

The Mage of Flowers has arrived on a spring wind to see you, earnestly walking beneath a frigid sky.

"The chilly winter is over! I brought a budding spring wind for you!"

Even Fou's winking alongside her. Just this once.

I know this doesn't really mean anything to him. I don't mind though. I'm doing this for me. It is a consort's duty, in any case! 

Lips press to a token of love, reflected in its author's own stunned eyes. Pride and love make for a most complicated war.

She slips into the land of dreams, chivalry giving way to drowsiness. This is no feast. We have a gift ready for her.

...Well done, little one.

It's almost time for finals at Chaldea High School. Once the ordeal is over, it'll be time to say goodbye to the classmates you know so well. Is that chocolate the fruit of a year's labor, or...? Either way, there is no greater reward than her smile.

"Hey...what the heck are you doing, Roland!? Are you telling me you want me to aim for THAT target?"

"What of it? A paladin must always be brave."

"Keep the mischief to a minimum, you two. And you should know I always get serious in a game, even if it's for fun! You both know what happens if you lose...right?"

(Both) "Y-your Imperial Majesty...!"

Archery has always been a favorite knightly pastime, so it's no surprise that a new game in modern times would generate excitement. And so the knights hone their techniques even to this day.

"I'm glad you could make it. A relaxing trip will be good for you, Master."

"Let us rest our wings together, my children, my Romans."

"M-me, too?"

"Our Divine Father insists. We have a great deal of ground to cover, so I hope you're ready!"

May you find a brief moment of peace as you take the final emperor's extended hand.

When a pair who has devoted their entire lives to mathematics play a game, there is a clear difference between one who is in the middle of constructing a proof and another who has already completed it. And while the gap of experience will never close...

"So young! So green! But that's not a bad thing, really. They say hard work in youth is quiet rest in old age, you know? Consider this a VALUABLE lesson from your elder."

"I will not relent... Even if the answer is already evident, I will not accept it! I will never grow up to be like you!"

However, one's mentality, it seems, can regress.

"Honestly, you both are quite childish. The feeling of witnessing my archenemy in such a state is...difficult to put into words."

"Brought lunch from home again, Yamanami? I should follow your example instead of just chugging highly caffeinated drinks and calling it a day."

"I just threw some leftovers together, so it is nothing fancy. You're more than welcome to try a bite. I can't guarantee it will satisfy your palate, though."

Under the beautiful warmth of the sun, notable brilliant minds are having a peaceful lunch at a certain cafeteria of a boarding school.

"By the way, I recently started a Pankration course geared towards setting some of the more unruly students straight. Would you two be interested in attending, for some light exercise?"

(Both) "No, thank you."

"Helldyste! So this is a flower-viewing! We love sunbathing, so this is great! What about you, Hua-hua?"

"Hm. I hear there's a custom of viewing cherry blossoms in Master's hometown, and I do agree it's quite nice. My sons also seem to be enjoying themselves."

"Whoa! The petals look like they are dancing!"

"Careful not to run around too much!"

"There are sweets and tea too."

"This one's mine! First come, first served!"

The warrior squints in the spring sunshine. He watches the scene fondly, as if thinking back on days of yore.

"Hm, are you the new guy who joined last month? You look like a hard worker."

"Oh, David. Great work as always! I'm sorry I didn't introduce myself earlier."

"Don't worry about it. Your smile is enough for me. But you know, I wouldn't take that route if I were you. Take that road instead. It might look like the longer way round, but it's actually more efficient."

"I see. Thanks for the advice!"

"And there's also some perks to the job. See that bakery across the bridge? The girl, Abishag, who runs that shop is so beautiful."

"Uh...huh. Abishag...?"

"All right, you two, we should start our deliveries. Let's get going before the sun sets!"

A postman's day starts early. Precious sentiments shouldn't be left waiting.

Hot, passionate, fiery men leap into action...each to prove he is a man among men.

"My hands are worthy to grasp the flag of victory. Don't you agree? Ooh la la!"

"Yeah, that's golden! The Genji excel in battles you can't back down from!"

"A place for true men to compete against each other, huh!? Then, as a warrior, I can't help but get excited!"

Now that enthusiasm has reached a fever pitch, how will the battle end?

"And that's when my spear pierced the giant...right between the eyes!"

"Oh ho. Having a drink with heroes means there's no shortage of nonsense stories of valor."

"As long as the stories flow, so will the drink. The more the story is seasoned, the better it pairs with a drink, you know."

Even without a performance or music in the background, conversation is sure to liven up the room. And the more years under an individual's belt, the more sophisticated and complex they are. Should one be in the company of these people, the experience would be as a banquet in paradise.

"Should the veil of darkness shroud the forest, one need only shed light upon it."

"Hmmm. Warm. Bright. Lobo, are you feeling okay?"

(Growls sleepily)

Night passes peacefully for both human and beast. The warmth they feel will surely carry them to tomorrow.
Mystic embryos drifting in a man-made womb filled with nurturing and rearing liquid. And while its name has not yet been established, it sleeps and dreams of a world in which it will blossom.

Humanity accumulates experience, knowledge, and stories to pave the path they walk from the past to the future, allowing them to mature. A trivial conversation may have taken place in an hour. An invaluable friendship may have formed in a day. Glorious growth may have occurred over the span of a year. But nobody can perfectly recall it all. What remains is only the end result; the process is always forgotten.

In the long run, or even objectively, there was not much difference between the boy and humans. At the end of the day, his memory was updated. It returned to nothingness. White. The boy retained only what he needed. Twenty-three hours and fifty-five minutes lost every day. Any shining event of the day is bleached away. But there's five whole minutes of the boy's conviction....the will to resist the update allowed him to retain memories that should never be lost or forgotten.

And then the boy grew up. He collected only the information required in order to look like a "certain human." It never crossed his mind whether it was genuine or not, because it's simple for one to wish, believe, and vow for something. The one and only Grand Order that makes him close to humankind is the idea that "humans do good things."

Mother.

It is a grand thing to be. Mothers both have and give great love. Mothers are kind, sometimes stern, and embrace all warmly. Their acts should never go unpraised.

Love.

A magnificent mother's love. Love more vast than the ocean...

Pray you never drown in it.

With a smile, she offers you a bite.

It's delicious. There's so much packed into this single dish. What you ask? That's a pretty insensitive thing to ask a maiden, don't you think?

Her extraordinary smile doesn't allow any room to interrupt. And with a look of anticipation in her eyes, she asks again:

Care for a bite?

It may just be a game, but it's also a game. And if you're going to play, you shouldn't give it anything less than your best. But this is not to start a quarrel. It is meant for us to enjoy together.

That's what a place of play is all about. It's a place where you can see many smiling faces.

Under the golden sky, she dances. She is a flower that rustles in the wind, a flame that watches over the night. She flutters, flickers.

Alone, she dreams of thunderous applause. As she dozes, as she sings...

Her innocence is unmatched. Nothing can match her nobility. Bow your heads. Down on your knees. None may lift their head higher in the presence of the little miss.

The one who stands before us dazzles brighter than a rainbow and is lord of the castle.

One, they exorcise calamities.
Two, their blades are sharp enough to cut through mist.
Three and four, they jump and dodge the snapping jaws.
Five and six, they dance and slice as they move.

Seven, their courage is savage and furious.

Who will be shredded to eights?

A challenge can neither be too difficult nor too easy. It must be just right; one must bend one's knees to leap or stretch out their arms just far enough for someone to reach, to overcome... The challenge should also give those who undertake it a sense of accomplishment to make it feel fun. The sweet spot is forty percent technique, sixty percent inventiveness.

May all participants take on this exciting challenge.

Good night. Look to the heavens.

Sleep tight. Look to the sky.

Then quietly and peacefully...fall in a spinning descent.

"Rest assured. I will not let you go until you are completely healed."

You fall into a sweet, yet dim dream.
Waiting in a room was the lone Expedition Tam Lin. Come, ready your weapon once more. Take a deep breath and prepare for confrontation. The moment the spear glows red, the victor steadies her gaze.

Fast-paced thoughts swirl around her mind daily.
But sometimes it is necessary to slow down.

Like drifting on the calm sea, like watching the moon's phase...
Even if she may never sleep or stop, she does it deeply, thoughtfully, and slowly.

Night falls, the sky pales. Her wish is to at least illuminate the ship's path, even if only briefly.
Jeweled claws of distinction recognizing bravery in defeating Demonic Beasts. But the threat changes shape and comes in swarms, creeping up toward one's throat.

You give your all every day. Why don't you take a nice break to refresh yourself once in a while?

Put down your heavy bags. Put any looming tasks you need aside. Give your exhausted feet a well-deserved reward.

Loosen up and let all that tension fade away.

May your feet be light on your journey.

We never needed words before. But now, it's no longer possible to convey a single thought, even if I were to try putting it into words. I'm not honest enough with myself to say it out loud in the first place. I'm not good at showing it in my behavior, either. Then, the least I can do is to be thorough. I will weave every single flower carefully and then give it to them as a gift. That's what I can do for my twin, who has been at my side...then, now, and always.

In the deep, dark woods where even the rays of morning light cannot reach...

With shimmering, bewitching feet,
With beckoning fingers,
A jewel-like fairy twirls and dances, light as air.

Her movements tantalize you, making you forget about the coming days. She captivates you, making you lose sight of the sun's rays.

It's the winged butterfly's solo performance.

After crossing numerous steep mountain passes and slogging along muddy roads, you will eventually have but one step left to take.

Even if there is no one there to praise you...
Even if there is no one there to witness it...
...the muddy residue will be proof of your achievements.

The artisan's pride wishes for such an honor, and they continue to work, pouring all their hopes and dreams into their craft.

A fictional world set on the moon. The curtain will soon fall on the day's events.

The tension that's felt, like the slow descent of the hammer's final stroke, continues to ward off the quiet of peace.

Still, the boy continues his determined course to the summit.

Even while he does not know who he is.

A maiden's secret was abandoned on the dark side of the moon. A story that begins at the end. The confession that echoes in the distance seems to dance between rejection and pleading. It's frail, weak, and sweet.

That's why the girl pushes through the door to respond.

...Into the sunset that never ends.

It was just a small, insignificant fact that most people would have missed: the children had stopped smiling.

That was all.

But that small fact was sufficient reason to point a gun at the world...to choose chaos over stability.

She looks to the sky in the east, hoping to believe that the beautiful, colorful flowers will bloom once more beyond the sandy landscape.

I'm glad to have adventured with you. It was a pleasant dream. That time was a miracle for me, who should have not existed in the first place.

That's right... If I had to choose something important to me, this moment would eclipse all others. Ah, this warmth and sensation. I've always wanted this...

This is a painting of a dreamscape. It shows an image of a world where individuals who were split apart managed to carry out the purpose that was born deep within their hearts, rather than acting in accordance with someone else's idea and written as code. You imagine, as you nap...

The gentle melodic sighs coming from the girls' quiet breathing.

Deep within the forest, cocooned breath dwells within a stone idol.
From its earthly cradle, it awaits a visitor...any visitor.

It's a collection of records someone left behind, or perhaps the scars of someone's past. Some may manage to reach the hands of subsequent generations, while others may disappear into obscurity after being chewed up by silverfish. This could be a pile of treasure, or simply a paper graveyard.

Even so...how can we not love their innocent desires longing to never be forgotten?

Just as day and night each serve a purpose, that a coin has a two sides does not argue for one being better than the other. Both are real. Both are true.

That her brilliance is difficult to perceive does not mean it is not there.

We're going to go to the dragon's backbone with my companion! We'll hold our courage tightly in slightly sweaty hands, and the winds of the demon king's breath may make our knees tremble a bit. The thrill of imagination can turn any trembling anxiety into heart-pounding anticipation.

That's right! You can be the protagonist of an adventure anytime. No need to be afraid. Just put one foot in front of the other on the path to unclaimed glory.

Cautiously. Thoroughly. Boldness is not my style. Just aiming high does not erase one's strengths and weaknesses. I may not be able to carry a large rock, but I am foolish enough to take the time to find and identify an opportunity. It's difficult to live without regrets, but I certainly struggle in the attempt.

There's still some time before the horn that signals the beginning of battle will blow. The young man takes even a deeper breath, his brow furrowing.

"The summer sun and sea? It'll be okay. I love them! I once caught an octopus in the cold sea before! True Ancestor, heading out!"

A vampire princess who appeared under the summer sky. It goes without saying that her appearance is dazzling as the sun.

People question whether there's anybody who could possible handle this princess

Numerous "rock cacti" spread out as far as one can see. They are a symbol of people's prosperity.

Revere them. Praise them.

They swim through the sky and play with dew as they flap their wings in the summer, shimmering...singing. And at its peak, flowers will bloom.

It's like a jam session with sprays of water. They twirl about as if dancing a waltz. They dance their acrobatic dance in the glittering light of summer, setting romance aside. The higher the tides swell, the higher they go. They dance and jump, reaching into the distance.

They are hotter than the scorching sunlight. They're at their highest, most intense.

"This long barrel's great. It'll increase my power. It's also great that it makes me even more accurate. Honestly, I feel great. I'm pretty sure I can hit the target now. You want to know what happened to my right leg? We're on vacation, after all. It's only polite to keep up appearances, isn't it?"

It was a store he just stopped by on a whim, but he found a toy he liked more than he expected, and so the black sun was in high spirits.

The two knights extend their hands on the beach once again. One will escort you like a trusty butler, while the other will do so gallantly like an older brother.

If you don't hurry and take one of their hands, the purple-, red-, and the blond-haired men will also come and ask you for your hand.

Even if the theme is narrow, love for one's bias never changes. The outfits may be different, but they are worn by the same maiden. Surely the holy maiden will allow it and forgive them.

The work of the Normalization Committee never ends.

The sound of the music lures one to find two tight-knit sisters together. The plucking of strings and tinkling laughter feels like a blessing to one's ears.

This is just another midsummer afternoon.

The ocean connects to the outside world.

Listening to the sound of the waves and smelling the sweltering tide makes a cup of sake even more delicious.

It is even better if enjoyed with one's mentor.

"Hurry up, Daybit. We'll never get another chance like this!"

His breathless voice hides neither his anticipation nor his excitement as he calls out to me.

"To think the sky might clear up only for five minutes! It's like the eye of a typhoon!"

I just happened to be in the hallway when he burst out of his room. He explained the situation and then he took my hand and started to run.

A band of light streaks across the dark of space. With a satisfied grin, he watches the aurora spread over the sky. His elated thoughts and impressions were for himself, the friend next to him, and the little friend he left far behind, but never forgot.

"I'm going to see lots of beautiful things. That's why I was born."

Being born must be a metaphor for something. Perhaps his values died once but then were revived. The desire that was born at that time must be what is driving him. And once I realized that, I began to voice my own opinions.

Our conversation grew lively and we started talking about our dreams. Our methodology and philosophy differed, but neither of us rebuffed the other. We simply laughed, saying, "I hope that turns out to be true."

An astronomical observation that lasted for five minutes. In that moment, we felt like we were boys again.

The excitement of preparing for a tea party feels like a Sunday before a school trip. The sweet, fragrant aroma of freshly baked sweets wafts in the air, the tea changes its hue as it reflects the morning light, and the conversation flourishes over chatter of relationships. 

It is a brief moment of respite.

...Perhaps we should invite them again next time.

I'm not strong enough to turn away from adversity. Then again, I also know better than to go up against my rivals. I hate to admit my shortcomings, or I just don't like to face my own limitations. Either way, I can't stand the fact that I can neither run nor fight.

"Hm? Don't get so down on yourself, Kadoc. Feeling inferior to a genius is a gift in itself. To have motivation despite seeing the cruel reality is the kind of talent only an average Joe can possess. You feel shame? Nah. I'd call that stubbornness. Folks like you end up surviving better than us geniuses. Believe me, I've seen my fair share of that kind of thing!"

The self-proclaimed "big brother" chatted cheerfully, and for some reason on this particular day, his words resonated in my heart.

I know why.

Even if I have no talent, no title, no recognition, and nothing to be proud of...that doesn't mean I should be morose...because only I can be me. So no matter how unsightly it may be, I'm going to keep struggling till the end.

She did not have any special gifts. Neither did she have any extraordinary connections. Yet, the goodness and humility within her...her sincerity and simplicity were enough of a reason for a miracle.

The girl transforms herself into a maiden. For whom is that prayer...?

An opulent banquet, a gathering of those who dream of the future. But the more dazzling those conversations are, the deeper and darker the shadows that scurry along the ground become.

Their roots extend and spread to lay the groundwork. Secretly, but surely.

They burrow through the shadowy depths and use the façade of the old castle housing those who will eventually become fools as their stepping stone...leading the stronghold beyond the end.

A beautiful smile more brilliant than sparkling waves. Her regal appearance―voluminous hair and horns unlike anything present in humanity―cannot be hidden even when she's on vacation.

O great sovereign of Earth, incarnation of noblesse oblige, supreme being who governs all intelligent life on Earth!

Until the day she has it all, she will continue to be spectacularly fabulous and enjoy her vacation on Earth with no time to sleep.

"Huh? I never sleep in the first place. And this is all part of the job!"

Countless lights falling like tears.
Strings of flickering lights paint the night sky.

As it scatters without sound, the scene robs one of words, stirs the heart, then fades, leaving behind only a faint sense of excitement.

What descends now is what comes "next"...an end that will never come, leaving those bearing witness behind.

A gentle ocean breeze now and then is nice, isn't it? Apologies. I do hope you'll indulge my whims. I just want to give you the time I was never allowed to spend with you in the past.

The hands attempting to reach towards the man, burning with love, are not crimson only because of the sun's hot rays...but there is no doubt the man does not realize that.

Then again, I already knew he was thick-headed, so nothing could be done about that!

Yesterday we were there, and today we will go here. We'll fly, we'll ride, or we'll walk. Not every day will be a sunny one, but that doesn't mean it's always rainy, either!

The cakes they serve over there are bitter, while the coffee served here is probably sweet. The blunders I might make will leave a sour aftertaste, or my bittersweet success...all will be spices to enrich my memories.

Okay, I'm going to lace up my shoes and go out in search of what the world has to offer in the here and now.

From one journey to the next, I'm going to travel around the world...the world in which you live.

The wind blew, and clouds floated along. There are no guideposts, but rivers run to some destination.

How long will our footprints remain as proof of our travels? They will probably be gone tomorrow. Still, that is why I will relish this moment.

Add this and your Craft Essence will level up! 
Looks like a great card, huh? 
What? But I'll disappear? Noooo!

Your Craft Essence will level up with this card! 
Pretty good deal, huh?
...What? I'll disappear? Hmmm...

A mysterious substance from Mysterious Heroine X's ship.
It's filled with mysterious energies that can power up Craft Essences.
No Pollution, No Risk, No Tesla.
Although it seems to be somekind of fuel but it actually tastes quite delicious.
This is too good to be true, it must be a dream!

It was a dream.

A mysterious substance from Mysterious Heroine X's ship.
It's filled with mysterious energies that can power up Craft Essences.
By letting the spherical matter in the middle to dip into Liquid 1 through Liquid 5 in order, it will form into something.
Depending on how you look at it, it might be grotesque.

It was grotesque.

Valentine's chocolate from Mash Kyrielight.

After 17 rounds of trial and error, and 27 trips to the Singularity to gather ingredients, this is finally complete.
Happy Valentine's Day, Master.

Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon.

With all my thanks for all that you do.
This royal taste and style is for you.

Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Alter).

It's hard to express gratitude in words and attitude.
The most powerful Servant has come to steal the most powerful Master.
Don't think that your Valentine will knock on your door a second time.
This junky taste and style is for you.

Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Lily).

I've modeled this after my favorite thing!
May this carry my feelings to you.

Valentine's chocolate from Nero Claudius.

I made this myself!
The laurel wreath is the symbol of the Roman emperor, you know.
You'd better keep that in mind as you gnash your teeth on that chocolate!

Valentine's chocolate from Altera.

...The insides are edible. I'm sure of it.

Valentine's chocolate from Chevalier d'Eon.

I have this one favorite shop in Paris...
Just one bite of their food, and you will be completely hooked!
That's the flavor that I was going for.
Do you think I did a good job?

Valentine's chocolate from Boudica.

Sorry it's so big.
Really.
Uh, but look...that means that I was able to stuff more love into it.
How's that?
Don't eat it in one go.
You can leave some for later, okay?

Valentine's chocolate from Okita Souji.

I, Okita Souji, went to line up at a famous sweets shop early this morning to get this chocolate for you, Master!
Don't you love this Shinsengumi-style wrapping paper, too?

Valentine's chocolate from Mordred.

Isn't it deliciously crunchy?
But next time, go buy some yourself!
Next year? Well, I guess it can't be helped.
If I remember next year, that is!

Valentine's chocolate from Nero Claudius (Bride).

Yes, I made this myself!
Our wedding is still a ways off, but here, take this sweet bouquet!

Valentine's chocolate from Atalante.

You may have this.
Feel free to use the apple against me in a race, if you want...
But be prepared if you do.
That's what it means to defeat me.

Valentine's chocolate from Euryale.

Love?
Of course there's no love in this.
I only made it because I felt like it.
Random?
Of course it would be! Humph!

Valentine's chocolate from Orion.

It's as if this chocolate statue is trying to say something...

Valentine's chocolate from Oda Nobunaga.

When you split this skeleton chocolate vertically, like this...
Look, you can turn it into a mask!
Hahahahaha! Pretty neat, don't you think?
...Huh?
Why are you looking at me like that?

Valentine's chocolate from Elisabeth Báthory.

I am going to cover this with my gratitude for you and make demon-warding, charm-flavored sweets for you.
Which means...it's got to be an octopus!
...That's what you do for Valentine's Day, right?

Valentine's chocolate from Scáthach.

...One strike, one kill.

Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Alter).

Beyond the sweetness, you'll find what's beyond your consciousness.
I suggest you keep that in mind when you take a bite of it.

Valentine's chocolate from Brynhild.

See, it's perfect for you...
I used runes to freeze it, so it will never melt again.
You can display it eternally, or you can eat it immediately.
...Oh, I'm sorry.
If you eat it, you may get a stomach ache.

Valentine's chocolate from Medusa.

It's not much, but please accept this gift.
I get the feeling that you're always catching me in a humiliating moment, but one must always want to engage in love or battle in style, right?

Valentine's chocolate from Ushiwakamaru.

All right, please have some of this!
The taste is as sharp as can be!
If you'd like, we can go chop some heads together sometime!

Valentine's chocolate from Marie Antoinette.

Oh, is this what you call a message card?
Is it like a letter, I wonder? All right, then...
Let's see...
Good afternoon.
Please enjoy my utmost feelings for you.

Valentine's chocolate from Martha.

You don't remember anything, do you?
No.
No.
I don't blame you...
These are just some sweets baked by a humble town girl, but please have some if you like.

Valentine's chocolate from Francis Drake.

Here! It's pretty sweet, but here you go.
I hear it's a good idea to give things you like to the people dear to you, so I've put a lot of brandy jelly inside it!

Valentine's chocolate from Anne Bonny & Mary Read.

What? I'm supposed to write a message? S-Sure thing.
Uh...
Master, I've tasted this numerous times, so I think it should be safe.
I'd be happy if you ate it all.
Also, thanks for everything.
Someday, I'd like to, um, go on a cruise with you and Anne.
What do you think?

Valentine's chocolate from Altria Pendragon (Santa Alter).

I've stuffed this stocking full of chocolates.
You can grab double handfuls and eat away.
Is there anything happier in this world?

Valentine's chocolate from Medea.

To my student who appeared out of thin air:
Since you can use Valentines as part of your rituals, please keep your nose to the grindstone, and use this as an example.

Valentine's chocolate from Elisabeth Báthory (Halloween).

Come on, I know what a Valentine is!
It just has to be sweet, hard, and crunchy, right?
In that case, this is the right answer!
Master, please have some pumpkin sweets!

Valentine's chocolate from Medea (Lily).

Thank you for always looking out for me, Master.
It's just a small gift, but please accept my gratitude.

Valentine's chocolate from Tamamo-no-Mae.

Sweets are to be enjoyed with the eyes and tasted with the tongue.
Though this is a western custom, I,
Tamamo-no-Mae, gave everything I had to create these for you.
Please give them, and me, a taste♡

Valentine's chocolate from Nursery Rhyme.

A sweet, cold fragment of snow.
My gift to you, so warm even on a winter night.

From now on and forever, don't ever forget to dream.

Valentine's chocolate from Stheno.

Yes, I have made this with all the love in my heart.

...Of course it's a lie.
Is there a problem?

Valentine's chocolate from Jing Ke.

I made it somewhat bitter, so it'll go well with alcohol.
Now let's go grab a drink!
I am not letting you go home tonight!

Valentine's chocolate from Mata Hari.

There are so many things that I want, but more than anything, I want your love, Master.

Valentine's chocolate from Carmilla.

It was supposed to turn out like that chocolate!
It's not my fault! It's the cooking utensils and the ingredients and the weather!
But it does taste pretty good...I think.

Valentine's chocolate from Jack the Ripper.

I worked so hard to make this! Praise me!
- From Hell

Valentine's chocolate from Mysterious Heroine X.

All right, now I'm popular with the kids!
Of course, the staff at the chocolate factory are the Sabers other than myself.
I'm going to make them learn to sing and dance!

Valentine's chocolate from Kiyohime.

Please go ahead and enjoy this present♪
Come on, come on, come on, come on♡

Valentine's chocolate from Tamamo Cat.

Now that's a Valentine's chocolate!
If this is love, then what is love?
I don't know.
All I know is that while I was making this, I couldn't have been happier...
That's all!
I love you so much, Master!

Valentine's chocolate from Frankenstein.

(A giant heart sign on a piece of paper.)

Valentine's chocolate from Jeanne d'Arc.

For you who always face every challenge
head-on and never escape.
But, please let me spoil you every once in a while, okay?

"Those who would engage in combat are all in the battle formation before me."
(Rin Pyou Tou Sha Kai Jin Retsu Zai Zen)
An ancient sword with a 9-character inscription on the back.
This historical weapon is a Mystic that rivals magecraft.

"To kill a rabbit, one doesn't need a secret rendezvous.
All you need is a single sword."

Many creatures are often chosen as familiars, but not many mages would choose insects, especially those insects that are not of this world.

This insect is the informant of hell itself.
As a parasite, the host will gain various abilities, but ultimately, this insect's true nature is to devour, multiply, and destroy.
There's nothing that awaits the host except terrifying demise.

Valentine's Day chocolates from Ryougi Shiki (Saber).

The circumstances are unclear, but as she's manifested to this world, she headed over to a famous department store and purchased these expensive Japanese sweets after carefully trying each of them.

"I never dreamed I would be able to experience something like this."

Those who witnessed her shop saw a secretly smiling, exceptional beauty like a delicate flower blooming in the night.

Valentine's Day chocolates from Miyamoto Musashi... Chocolates?

Two exquisite dumplings on a stick. And udon.
While handmade chocolates are not her forte, this is what she came up with after thinking on what the recipient would like most.

In her mind, the thing that makes her the happiest is sure to delight the recipient as well.
Such a line of thinking indicates that she is still a novice when it comes to love.

Valentine's return gift from Siegfried.

"Um...I'm sure it's nothing to be excited about..." is what he says as he hands you a dragon costume set. Yet, as expected from an invention of Da Vinci, it does not disappoint. 
One could use its wings to soar in the skies for 5 turns, while the tail can deal 3d6 damage to enemies, with a range of 5.

Valentine's return gift from d'Eon.

In the evening, you are called to a certain room.
Next to a quietly crackling fireplace, d'Eon is standing with flushed cheeks, holding something out to you.

"A bonfire would have been best, but..."

D'Eon hands you a toasted marshmallow on a stick.

Valentine's return gift from Rama.

A banana brand that Hanuman approves of.
When Rama fought alongside the monkeys, he ate these and then joined in battle. Or so it seems.

Sita is incredibly popular amongst the monkeys, and she was chosen to be a mascot for the bananas.

Valentine's return gift from Lancelot (Saber).

An iris gifted by Lancelot. The significance of the iris is "hope" and "good news," among other things.
But could this be a bit on the nose?
...At least, that's what Lancelot the playboy is worried about.

Valentine's return gift from Gawain.

The main gift is sunblock, but the set includes a tasteful assortment of essential women's makeup.
A knight who can naturally prepare such an item and give it with a refreshing smile is...yeah.
Why can't he put this much effort into battle? The mystery continues.

Hero Elisabeth　→　Give　→　Item

A shining orb...shaped chocolate.
It is said that it can strip away the dark robes of a demon king.
Turning something that important into chocolate through alchemy makes Elisabeth's potential as a hero truly immeasurable.

Valentine's return gift from Caesar.

Cena, a feast for the ancient Roman nobility.
As one would expect from him, the sheer amount of food is exponentially more than usual.
There's more fruit, in an attempt to be health-conscious.

"What? There's too much? Guess we have no choice but to invite Cleopatra over!"

Valentine's return gift from Gilles de Rais (Saber).

A fanzine from the Jeanne Fan Club.
"I keep telling you that various versions of me don't just sprout up like weeds!"
...so the White Saint comments.
But aren't there still the magical girl or high school uniform versions of you?

Valentine's return gift from Fergus.

Two stylish cocktails sit on the bar counter. A hotel room key sits casually between the two glasses.

Actually, not so casually.
It's placed deliberately, practically shouting that it wants to be noticed!

Valentine's return gift from Bedivere.

A variety of expensive cookies inside a silver can.
A sensible choice that gives the impression that the gifter has refined taste. 
If you tell him what you thought of its taste, he'll probably be thrilled.

Valentine's return gift from the King of Heroes.

The wearer itself is the main focus, but the accessory glistens with both modesty and dignity without fail. 
He may seem to be a pushy man, but his consideration for beauty makes his friend smile.

Valentine's return gift from Orion (Bear).

Snack stick, barbeque-flavored.
It's perfect for kids to play swords with.

You can also put them between your fingers like you're holding the Black Keys.
Hey, you tanned kid with spikey hair. Don't get any ideas about using those snack sticks for magecraft while murmuring "Set..."!

Valentine's return gift from Nikola Tesla.

Lots of freshly baked cookies.
Tesla's face is drawn on the cookies.
